    Configuration - Annotation Interface in in.testautomationstudio.commons.annotation
    Marks a class with the location of a properties (configuration) file to be used when binding property values to fields annotated with PropertyKey.
    ConfigurationReader<T> - Interface in in.testautomationstudio.commons.reader

    PropertiesReader<T> - Class in in.testautomationstudio.commons.reader
    Reflection-based implementation of ConfigurationReader that binds property values from a classpath resource (properties file) into a target bean's fields.
    PropertiesReader() - Constructor for class in.testautomationstudio.commons.reader.PropertiesReader
    Create an empty reader that will attempt to discover the properties file via the Configuration annotation on the target bean's class.
    PropertiesReader(String) - Constructor for class in.testautomationstudio.commons.reader.PropertiesReader
    Create a reader that uses the supplied filePath when loading properties.
    PropertyKey - Annotation Interface in in.testautomationstudio.commons.annotation
    Annotation used to bind a Java field to a key in a properties source.
    PropertyValueParser<T> - Interface in in.testautomationstudio.commons.parser
    Strategy interface for converting raw property values (strings) into application types.
